Railway Property Designation and Form of
Transfer Regulation No. 3
reg:regulation.reg:amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B.C. Reg. 21/2010, January 18, 2010]

bcl:section.bcl:text: The real property and rights, titles and interests described in Schedule A are designated as railway property for the purposes of sectionÂ 45 of the British Columbia Railway Act.
This regulation is the prescribed form of transfer for the purposes of section 45 (5) of the British Columbia Railway Act.
The railway properties described in Schedule B are designated as subdividable properties for the purposes of section 45 of the British Columbia Railway Act.

bcl:centertext.in:em:
Schedules A and B are exempt from publication. Copies of these schedules may be obtained from the following location:
British Columbia Railway Company, Suite 600, 221 West Esplanade,
North Vancouver, BC V7M 3J3, telephone: 604 678 4714, fax: 604 678 4702
